summary:
Degree qualified, flexible and motivated professional, experienced in Shutdown/Turnaround and Maintenance Planning as well as Project Planning& Control.
Self-starter and good communicator with proven ability to take a lead role and perform against fixed deadlines.
Has strong analytical skills and in-depth experience in Planning in all aspects of scheduling from detail level to summary.
Experienced Primavera and SAP user.
More than 15-year experience working with and managing groups of multinational project and operation personnel in the Uzbekistan.
